attributes.review: absolutely hate this app. never had so much trouble trying to use it. made my phone shut down and STOLE MY PERSONAL DATA!! can’t believe apple has left this app up!!

attributes.review: This app was not helpful at all, to literally anyone. All this app does is spread hate and violence. Horrible app. Horrible that there is an app for white supremicists and homophobes now. Why cant yall just be respectful for once?
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: when i opened the app i was terrified as i saw and weird looking ✨orange✨. it was a terrible thing to see as i had just eaten lunch and had to go to the hospital due to uncontrollable vomiting. my hospital bills ended up being hundreds of thousands of dollars. i never even got harry styles to show up to my house as the app promised. i am extremely disappointed by this. not good.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: the app wasn’t effective everytime i tried to open the app it would crash and ultimately it was very useless. i think it would be a great idea to take the app down and take a year to revamp it. after that year put it back on but rename it “orange app” because the color orange is very intriguing. please take into consideration this perfect plan. thank you
attributes.title: real review
